argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | imastps.u | |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) |
| 2 |  | imastps.v | |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 3 |  | imastps.f | |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) |
| 4 |  | imastps.r | |- ( ph -> R e. TopSp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` R ) = ( TopOpen ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` U ) = ( TopOpen ` U ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_imastopn | |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` U ) = ( ( TopOpen ` R ) qTop F ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 9 | 8, 5 | #P_istps | |- ( R e. TopSp <-> ( TopOpen ` R ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` R ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 11 | 2 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( TopOn ` V ) = ( TopOn ` ( Base ` R ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` R ) e. ( TopOn ` V ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_qtoptopon | |- ( ( ( TopOpen ` R ) e. ( TopOn ` V ) /\ F : V -onto-> B ) -> ( ( TopOpen ` R ) qTop F ) e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 3, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( TopOpen ` R ) qTop F ) e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_imasbas | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` U ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( TopOn ` B ) = ( TopOn ` ( Base ` U ) ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( TopOpen ` R ) qTop F ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` U ) ) ) |
| 18 | 7, 17 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` U ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` U ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` U ) = ( Base ` U ) |
| 20 | 19, 6 | #P_istps | |- ( U e. TopSp <-> ( TopOpen ` U ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` U ) ) ) |
| 21 | 18, 20 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> U e. TopSp ) |
